name: ESCAPE ROOM 2D
description:
Description: Escape Room 2D is an entertaining adventure game genre that allows players to transform into a character. 

Main Mission

Search and pick up 3 key chests in each map to complete the game.

Complete the mission in 20 minutes for each map.

Function

Players can exchange coin for items to increase blood or strength.

Game Content 

- Begin: The player chooses 3 maps corresponding with 3 characters (Archer, Soldier, Mage) 

 - Mid and late game: Escape Room will include 3 main maps (Jungle, Desert, City). Each map will be designed in the form of a wall requiring the player to collect all 3 hidden keys to open the gate. Each key will be protected by guards/monsters/boss
